sparse_mse¶

This module contains the implementation of Sparse MSE problem.

Author:
Chao Feng
class sparse_mse.SparseMSE(filename)[source]¶

This class implements the Sparse MSE problem.

__init__(filename)[source]¶

Initialization. :param filename: filename

constraint(solution)[source]¶

If the constraints are satisfied, the constraint function will return a zero or positive value. Otherwise a negative value will be returned.

Parameters:solution – a Solution object
Returns:a zero or positive value which means constraints are satisfied, otherwise a negative value
get_dim()[source]¶

Construct a Dimension object of this problem. :return: a dimension object of sparse mse.

loss(solution)[source]¶

loss function for sparse regression :param solution: a Solution object

static normalize_data(data_matrix)[source]¶

Normalize data to have mean 0 and variance 1 for each column

Parameters:data_matrix – matrix of all data
Returns:normalized data
position(s)[source]¶

This function is to find the index of s where element is 1 return a list of positions :param s: :return: a list of index of s where element is 1

read_data(filename)[source]¶

Read data from file. :param filename: filename :return: normalized data
